text: Jasper van den Heuvel (born 28 October 1978) is a Dutch rally driver. He competed in Intercontinental Rally Challenge (2008 edition, 2009 edition, 2011 edition, 2012 edition) during his career. He drove a Mitsubishi Lancer Evo X and later a Mitsubishi Lancer Evo X R4. In 2019 he won the ELE rally in a Ford Fiesta. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch sportspeople Category:Racecar drivers
title: Jasper van den Heuvel
